main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a white light object in the sky over Kettering, Ohio on July 22, 1967.
interesting points: The observer stated the object was the same brightness as a satellite and looked like a satellite, although the observer could not make out the details or movement.
The observer had difficulty determining the direction of movement of the object.
The report indicates the object was likely the Echo I satellite, which was in the area at the time of the sighting.
The Air Force requested the observer complete a questionnaire to provide more details for further evaluation.
The questionnaire covers details like time, location, weather conditions, description of the object, and the observer's background.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
